Name: FiveM
Author: FlashModz
StartupCommand: $(pwd)/alpine/opt/cfx-server/ld-musl-x86_64.so.1 --library-path "$(pwd)/alpine/usr/lib/v8/:$(pwd)/alpine/lib/:$(pwd)/alpine/usr/lib/" -- $(pwd)/alpine/opt/cfx-server/FXServer +set citizen_dir $(pwd)/alpine/opt/cfx-server/citizen/ +set sv_licenseKey {{FIVEM_LICENSE}} +set sv_maxplayers {{MAX_PLAYERS}} +set serverProfile default +set txAdminPort {{TXADMIN_PORT}} $( [ "$TXADMIN_ENABLE" == "1" ] || printf %s '+exec server.cfg' )
InstallScript:
#! /bin/bash
apt update
apt install -y tar xz-utils file jq git curl
MAINTAINER="FlashModz"
PVERSION="1.0"

if [ -d ./alpine ]; then
    echo ".###################################."
    echo ".#      Upgrade Project"
    echo -e ".#      Maintainer : ${MAINTAINER}"
    echo -e ".#      Version : ${PVERSION}"
    echo ".###################################."
    
    echo "Get/Set link with our selected version to download"
    if [[ "${FIVEM_VERSION}" == "" ]]; then
        echo -e "You Need to set an version"
        exit 2
    else
        DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo https://runtime.fivem.net/artifacts/fivem/build_proot_linux/master/${FIVEM_VERSION}/fx.tar.xz)
    fi
    
    echo -e "Running curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}"
    curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}
    
    echo "Extracting fivem files"
    FILETYPE=$(file -F ',' ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/} | cut -d',' -f2 | cut -d' ' -f2)
    if [ "$FILETYPE" == "XZ" ]; then
        tar xvf ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}
    else
        echo -e "A error occured. Exiting"
        exit 2
    fi
    
    rm -rf ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/} run.sh
    
    echo ".###################################."
    echo ".#      Upgrade Project"
    echo -e ".#      Maintainer : ${MAINTAINER}"
    echo -e ".#      Version : ${PVERSION}"
    echo ".###################################."
    echo -e "Upgrade complete with version : ${PVERSION}"
else
    echo ".###################################."
    echo ".#      Install Project"
    echo -e ".#      Maintainer : ${MAINTAINER}"
    echo -e ".#      Version : ${PVERSION}"
    echo ".###################################."
    
    mkdir -p /mnt/server/resources
    cd /mnt/server
    
    echo "Get/Set link with our selected version to download"
    if [[ "${FIVEM_VERSION}" == "" ]]; then
        echo -e "You Need to set an version"
        exit 2
    else
        DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo https://runtime.fivem.net/artifacts/fivem/build_proot_linux/master/${FIVEM_VERSION}/fx.tar.xz)
    fi
    
    echo -e "Running curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}"
    curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}
    
    echo "Extracting fivem files"
    FILETYPE=$(file -F ',' ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/} | cut -d',' -f2 | cut -d' ' -f2)
    if [ "$FILETYPE" == "XZ" ]; then
        tar xvf ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}
    else
        echo -e "A error occured. Exiting"
        exit 2
    fi
    
    rm -rf ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/} run.sh
    
    echo -e "Downloading default server.cfg config file from github repository of maintainer : ${MAINTAINER}"
    curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/FlashModz/image-egg/FiveM/games/FiveM/server.cfg >>server.cfg
    
    mkdir -p logs/
    echo ".###################################."
    echo ".#      Install Project"
    echo -e ".#      Maintainer : ${MAINTAINER}"
    echo -e ".#      Version : ${PVERSION}"
    echo ".###################################."
    echo -e "install complete with version : ${PVERSION}"
fi

Variables.Description: Set the fivem max players count for your server

Variables.DefaultValue: A New Server by Moonlight Panel
Variables.Description: The name of your server that shows up in the public server browser

The fivem version that is to be installed. - An example : 8552-7b609f5f63ca1ef211abde2fc0dc0d0a90cd9202 --> You can see all version from here - https://runtime.fivem.net/artifacts/fivem/build_proot_linux/master/
Enable the TxAdmin panel to manage your FiveM Server.
You can connect to your TX admin at this URL : https://panel.flashmodz.fr:(YOUR PORT)
